h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 2
content: You need to defeat this boss before you defeat the optional boss in the Chapter 1 Secret Area by ringing three large bells. Once you challenge the boss of the Ancient Guanyin Temple"), the Wandering Wight will disappear, and you will no longer be able to challenge him and gain his rewards!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 2'.
The content is as follows:
You need to defeat this boss before you defeat the optional boss in the Chapter 1 Secret Area by ringing three large bells. Once you challenge the boss of the Ancient Guanyin Temple"), the Wandering Wight will disappear, and you will no longer be able to challenge him and gain his rewards!
